value.title: StarCraft 2: STORM & DISRUPTOR DROPS! (Reynor vs Harstem)
value.excerpt: Reynor versus Harstem in a professional match of StarCraft 2. While Reynor mostly plays what we consider to be 'standard' at the pro level, Harstem brings some really cool moves to the game with Disruptor and High Templar Storm Drops. value.title: StarCraft 2: STORM DROPS! (MaNa vs SpeCial)
value.excerpt: Amazing game of professional Terran versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. This game is a constant back-and-forth between some of the best players outside of South Korea. One of the highlights are multiple storm drops that the Protoss player executes with a Warp Prism and several High Templar with Psionic Storm.
